Doesn't work with Toshiba bd player
Thank you for the response I do realize I made a mistake on the review and I currently updated thank you

Hi Alejandro,

This application is just a shortcut to the settings screen for miracast that was created by your phone manufacturer. The problems you are describing are related to the screencasting application that was opened by this shortcut, it has nothing to do with this app. I do not provide licenses. Good luck screen casting, though!

I'm sorry to hear that, it sounds like the your devices do not conform to the standard Android Settings screen for screencasting. Hopefully I can add support for your device in the future, but I am limited by how many devices I can manage to test. Thanks for trying.

title: Question
comment: Can i make my bluplayer work for Netflix on this app
Sorry, that is not a function of this application. This application is a shortcut for casting your entire screen to a Miracast supported device.

title: Works beautifully - Samsung Note 3 and Roku Streaming Stick
comment: I was going to spend $50+ to get a device to connect to my TV so I could watch shows and movies I have on my phone. Then I heard about this app. I installed it, within seconds it found my Roku streaming stick and I was watching my movie! I'd recommend this app (and a Roku streaming stick if you don't have a smart TV) to anyone!!
That is great to hear! I'm so glad my shortcut widget helped you to connect to your Roku device!

title: Doesn't work
comment: Doesn't work on Moto G 4G. Which I suspect is a Motorola problem rather than an app problem. Downloaded to use instead of the default cast screen setting and it did nothing other than take me to that setting.

This application is only a shortcut to that setting, you are seeing the intended behavior. I describe this in the app description. This app gives you a shortcut widget to reach that screen and to see what device you are casting to from your launcher.
After searching for so many cast apps luckily I found this. Works like a charm. Thank you for not making it a paid app. U guys r awesome. I connected xiaomi mi3 to my Samsung smart TV.

title: Does not work
comment: I keep getting the error message "Unfortunately, Settings has stopped". This is something I would be interested in using once it has been thoroughly tested. Droid Maxx

I'm very sorry to hear that! Unfortunately, some device manufacturers make their own tweaks to the settings application that cause it to behave differently from the standard Android version. I would love for it to work on all phones but I have limited test devices. Please report the crash and I'll work on fixing it!
